summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DynoPay Next.js 16 payment app z-index fix. Mobile language selector issue has been successfully resolved. All core features including language switching, theme toggle, copy functionality, and page loading are working perfectly.
passed_tests: Mobile language selector z-index fix - dropdown appears correctly above drawer
Mobile language selector allows selection of all 6 languages (EN, FR, ES, PT, DE, NL)
Mobile language selection changes URL locale correctly (/pay/demo to /fr/pay/demo)
Desktop language selector works with all 6 language options
Desktop language selection changes URL locale correctly (/pay/demo to /es/pay/demo)
Copy invoice button functionality with data-testid='copy-invoice-btn' is clickable
Fallback clipboard implementation is properly implemented
Desktop theme toggle switches between light and dark themes
Mobile theme toggle in drawer works correctly
Main page (/) loads successfully without errors
Demo payment page (/pay/demo) loads successfully without errors
Pay index page (/pay) loads successfully without errors
Internationalization working correctly (French and Spanish translations verified)
All data-testid attributes present and functional
No console errors or page crashes detected
